title: Immediate Sale Of House & Land
details:
On 30 PERCHES - An upstair house in four (4) units,
needing repair, with a front garden.
Close to ITN TV station in THALAWATHUGODA.
Two road accesses to the property on Dharmapala Mawatha.
Expected Price: over 35.0 Million.
Open to offers.

CALL ON WEEKDAYS ONLY
(9.00 a.m. TO 5.00 p.m.)
Tel: 0112691411 / 0112685799
All Ceylon Women’s Buddhist Congress
No. 400, Bauddhaloka Mawatha, Colombo 7.
Email: acwbc@sltnet.lk
